root.name: Motocross
root.description: Â Motocross is a 1 or 2 player intellivision racing game that does it's best to simulate the sport of Motocross. The game is notable for the odd design choice of having the camera follow who's in the lead regardless of weather or not that's an actual human player. If a cpu biker gets to far ahead he will freeze while the other player catches up to prevent the screen from scrolling away from the player.
